Type.Name: CornerType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CornerType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Specifies which corner a child widget should be placed in when packed into a . This is effectively the opposite of where the scroll bars are placed.
Docs.remarks: This is effectively the opposite of where the scroll bars are placed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CornerType BottomLeft = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Place the scrollbars on the top and right of the widget.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CornerType BottomRight = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Place the scrollbars on the top and left of the widget.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CornerType TopLeft = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Place the scrollbars on the right and bottom of the widget (default behaviour).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CornerType TopRight = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Place the scrollbars on the left and bottom of the widget.
